name: From Notes to Numbers
fileName: Automating the Standardization of Therapeutic Notes.jpg
description: An increasing amount of crucial information is stored in Electronic Health Records (EHRs). This project aims to standardize the notes taken by clinicians to track patient progress.

name: Parks and Property
description: How do parks affect nearby property values? This project uses data from the 3 largest cities in the US to analyze the relationship between parks and property values.

name: Vibrio Vulnificus Infections and their Link to Weather Conditions
description: How does the weather affect the spread of Vibrio Vulnificus?
